Articles.Content:
This are my points which I just gathered during a short playtime which jumped to my eye. Would be great if some of those points would be added or altered.

- Estimated node burn time indicator not found, important indicator to make vague guesses

- VAB/General; camera scroll up and down should be shift and scroll wheel, right now just messes up VAB

- Apoapsis periapsis indicator altitude missing (only current is shown), very crucial in maneuver planning on end point. display should be on respective AP/PE

- Maneuver editor should look like KSP (optimal), arrows too big, directions mostly unclear, also for the rotation tool. KSP direction wheel felt more natural

- UI is way to big and half the screen is overlay, closing buttons would be nice and size change in options

- In action group window it should be available to just click on part (group) to add it, not search through the list like currently (KSP 1 blue highlight). Also multiple parts (e.g. 8 solar panels) should be grouped, not each single added.

- Separator should have an additional attachment point in the middle if e.g. 2 engine part was chosen, not attaching on "left" or "right" engine only.

It could also be that the option is just hidden and I did not figure it out naturally as KSP 1 player. Generally it would be nice to have a ksp 1 UI and maneuver planning as it was simple, good looking and worked for over a decade perfectly. at least the option to change to the "classic" UI in the menu would nbe very nice.

Now to the moon!
